item.title: Why Linux sucks
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[quote=“Wizzup?, post:14, topic:421949”][quote author=Niall link=topic=524631.msg3824905#msg3824905 date=1322091830]

People who seriously believe Windows is better are either hardcore gamers or just too casual users. Most clever people who work on/with a computer for a living should certainly respect Linux.

you’ve got that the wrong way around in my opinion, my limited experience tells me that casual users have it easier on linux and the only people who have a problem are windows ‘power users’

of course games are another reason to have a proper windows install, as is software that just does not run on linux and there isn’t always a decent alternative
[/quote]

I agree; casual users have it easier on Linux. But so do power users. Most casual users just don’t know about Linux.[/quote]

RespectLinux != ThinkLinuxIsBetter.

Oh, let me translate that for you:

RespectLinux <> ThinkLinuxIsBetter (For the record, I neither respect Pascal nor think it is better. People who think Pascal is better either have spent too much of their life looking at SCAR-and-clones or are just casual programmers ;)).

Read full topic

item.title: Why Linux sucks
item.dc:creator: @Wizzup Wizzup?
item.description:
@Wizzup wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:12, topic:421949”][quote author=Wizzup? link=topic=524631.msg3824872#msg3824872 date=1322090094]
People who seriously believe Windows is better are either hardcore gamers or just too casual users. Most clever people who work on/with a computer for a living should certainly respect Linux.
[/quote]

you’ve got that the wrong way around in my opinion, my limited experience tells me that casual users have it easier on linux and the only people who have a problem are windows ‘power users’

of course games are another reason to have a proper windows install, as is software that just does not run on linux and there isn’t always a decent alternative[/quote]

I agree; casual users have it easier on Linux. But so do power users. Most casual users just don’t know about Linux.

Read full topic

item.title: Why Linux sucks
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

I used to use windows for everything, because of games I couldn’t get to work on Linux, recently traded my Windows install for Debian and an Xbox 360, I’m loving it.

All of the Windows software I have to use either has Linux bins or works very well in wine (even the stuff no one uses on linux, the CDs in the back of textbooks!)

Read full topic

People who seriously believe Windows is better are either hardcore gamers or just too casual users. Most clever people who work on/with a computer for a living should certainly respect Linux.

you’ve got that the wrong way around in my opinion, my limited experience tells me that casual users have it easier on linux and the only people who have a problem are windows ‘power users’

of course games are another reason to have a proper windows install, as is software that just does not run on linux and there isn’t always a decent alternative
